title: #413: Abraxas The Chicken Snake God With Miguel Conner
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome back Aeon Byte's Miguel Conner to set the record straight on Abraxas and the Gnostics' belief of what is Universe? Also in the intro we attempted to talk about what went down in Washington DC but unfortunately we were too depressed. Thank you for your support.

Please check out Miguel Conner's website and podcast:
https://thegodabovegod.com

Please check out Sam Tripoli's new podcast: Cash Daddies with Sam Tripoli and Howie Dewey

You deserve to feel happier, and Headspace is meditation made simple.. Go to HEADSPACE DOT COM SLASH TINFOIL
